entries.title: Copilot Development Instructions
entries.summary: **Purpose**: Brief, actionable guidance for AI coding agents working in this repo.  **Big Picture**: - **Monorepo-like layout**: top-level contains multiple subprojects: `frontend` (Next.js), `backend` (NestJS), `sdk-js` (typedoc + SDK), `contract`, and `tests`. - **Service boundaries**: frontend (port 3000) communicates with backend API (port 3001). SDK docs served on 3002 by `start-all.sh`. - **Why this structure**: separation between UI (`frontend`), API (`backend`) and SDK/docs (`sdk-js

entries.title: Start All Services Script
entries.summary: #!/bin/bash # Agentrix All-in-One Startup Script  # Kill existing processes on ports 3000, 3001, 3002 echo "ğŸ§¹ Cleaning up existing processes..." fuser -k 3000/tcp 2>/dev/null fuser -k 3001/tcp 2>/dev/null fuser -k 3002/tcp 2>/dev/null  # Get the script directory ROOT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "$0")" && pwd)"  echo "ğŸš€ Starting Backend (Port 3001)..." cd "$ROOT_DIR/backend" npm run start:dev > "$ROOT_DIR/logs/backend.log" 2>&1 & BACKEND_PID=$!  echo "ğŸš€ Starting Frontend (Port 3000)..." cd "$ROOT_DIR
